title: Greta Gerwig | A Closer Look: Trump Backs Roy Moore; Charlie Rose Fired for Sexual Harassment
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the White House continuing to stand by an accused sexual predator running for Senate so they can pass tax cuts.

Then, he interviews Greta Gerwig, director and writer of the new film "Lady Bird." She tells Seth about the letters she sent Justin Timberlake, Alanis Morrissette and Dave Matthews to allow them to use her music in the movie.

Gerwig then spoke to Late Night producer Sarah Jenks-Daly backstage where she answered a few additional questions exclusively for this podcast.

LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
